```{r results = FALSE, include = FALSE}
library(sf)
library(sp)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
# read data
aff_nocov <-
  st_read("satSCANoutputs/aff_nocov.col.shp")
alc_nocov <-
  st_read("satSCANoutputs/alcohol_nocov.col.shp")
anx <-
  st_read("satSCANoutputs/anx.col.shp")
ied <-
  st_read("satSCANoutputs/ied.col.shp")
ukroblast <-
  st_read("ukraineGIS/gadm36_UKR_1.shp")
```

```{r}
ggplot(ukroblast) +
  geom_sf() + 
  geom_sf(ied, map = aes(fill = REL_RISK)) +
  labs(title = "IED Relative Risk",
       fill = "Relative Risk") +
  theme(panel.grid.major = element_blank(), 
        panel.grid.minor = element_blank())

ggplot(ukroblast) +
  geom_sf() + 
  geom_sf(ied, map = aes(fill = REL_RISK)) +
  labs(title = "IED Relative Risk",
       fill = "Relative Risk") +
  theme(panel.grid.major = element_blank(), 
        panel.grid.minor = element_blank())
```
